body.transcript:
Hello, welcome to Melody Masters Music School. My name is Steven Howard. Could I have your name, please?

Hi Steven, my name is Crystal Martin.

Nice to meet you, Crystal. How can I assist you today?

I'm really upset about the quality of the recent piano lessons my daughter received.

I'm sorry to hear that, Crystal. Could you tell me which level your daughter is currently at?

She's at level three, but it feels like she's not making any progress.

Thank you for sharing that. Can you also provide the name of your daughter's instructor?

Her instructor's name is Mrs. Thompson.

I appreciate you providing these details. We strive for the highest quality and I will personally ensure this issue is addressed.

Thank you for your time, Crystal. We will follow up with you shortly to resolve this. Have a great day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Steven Howard from a random business discusses product quality with Crystal Martin. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

She's at level three, but it feels like she's not making any progress.

Thank you for sharing that. Can you also provide the name of your daughter's instructor?

Her instructor's name is Mrs. Thompson.

I appreciate you providing these details. We strive for the highest quality and I will personally ensure this issue is addressed.

Thank you for your time, Crystal. We will follow up with you shortly to resolve this. Have a great day!
